Description:
Exceptional Family Entertainer in Prime Position
Superbly situated in the heart of the Hunt Club, this Burbank home is perfect for young families, with welcoming street appeal and landscaped gardens accentuated by the large bay window.
Entering the home you are greeted with open plan yet distinct living areas, cleverly designed to take advantage of bay window space. At the heart of the home is the spacious kitchen that wraps around to fully involve all the family’s needs, from entertaining guests, to watching the children at play. It is designed for those who love to interact, with a sweeping bench that provides angles to make it easy to catch up with friends whilst rattling the pots and pans. Those who love to cook are catered for with 900ml oven range, and abundant cabinetry housing.
With the guest bedroom, study or office at the front, the home provides privacy with the main bedrooms set to the rear. Generous master bedroom with another bay window allowing for extra floor space, walk-in robe & en-suite. Two other good sized bedrooms come with double built-in robes. Main modern bathroom has separate bath and shower and separate toilet, along with a sizeable laundry & rear access to the back yard and workshop. Take the entertainment outdoors to the huge, completely enclosed pergola which has been transformed into a wonderful sunroom.
A double garage completes the picture for this fantastic family home.
Nestled in a peaceful street and a short walk to parklands, Cranbourne Park and Hunt Club shopping centre and schools. Close to Casey RACE aquatic centre, TAFE, library and entertainment hub. Transport links such as bus lines, South Gippsland Highway and train station are close-by, making this a prime location and meeting all your family needs.
